alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cimarron County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wheeless, or 22 miles west of Boise City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise City and Wheeless. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma.
